text.section: Each policy of health insurance shall contain the following provision:

The last sentence of the provision set forth in subsection (a) of this section may be omitted from a policy that the insured may continue in effect subject to its terms by the timely payment of premiums:
until the insured is at least 50 years old; or
if the policy is issued after the insured is 44 years old, for at least 5 years after its date of issue.
